hero.title: Destination Paradise
hero.subtitle: your next trip to Paradise...
hero.description: Welcome to your gateway to the enchanting Zanzibar Island! Imagine a place where each day is an adventure, and every horizon promises new discoveries.

stone_town.title: Stone Town Heritage Walk
stone_town.description: Embark on a journey through the timeless Stone Town, a place where history resonates in every alley.
stone_town.aria_label: Learn more about Stone Town Heritage Walk

safari_blue.title: Dhow & Snorkeling Safari Blue
safari_blue.description: Experience the authentic and unrivaled Safari Blue - a full-day excursion aboard traditional, locally-crafted sailing dhows.
safari_blue.aria_label: Learn more about Dhow & Snorkeling Safari Blue

spice_tour.title: Zanzibar Spice & Culture Tour
spice_tour.description: Embark on a half-day journey through Central Zanzibar, exploring the rich history shaped by cloves, nutmeg, cinnamon, and pepper.
spice_tour.aria_label: Learn more about Zanzibar Spice & Culture Tour
